Entries.nulHere: Man, Nul doesn't play around with spirit channeling.$h#$b#They even channeled my grand-aunt's spirit for her chocolate lava cake recipe.#$b#Instant best friend right there.$h
That Nul guy has a pretty sturdy looking build.#$b#Hey @, could you ask your friend, Tall-Dark-And-Witchy, if they're down for a game any time soon?$h
Oh! @, you startled me. I was just sorting out some exotic tea leaves that Nul gave me.$h
*sigh* Ever since Nul came to town it feels like Emily's been giving them more attention.$s#$b#Oh, uh... you didn't hear that.
Hmm... that Nul kid is always wearing that strange costume. I wonder why? And why a sheep of all things$u

@, that friend of yours is something else.$h#$b#They're like a living bridge between the known and the unknown, weaving stories of spirits seeking connection, of unfinished business and lingering emotions.

I absolutely adore your friend, Nul, @. It's like we're on the same wavelength.$h#$b#Tell them they're always welcome for a meditation session.#$b#And tell them I said thanks again for the summer wool.$h

Dearie, please let your friend know that they're free to visit me whenever they come to town.$h#$b#Here, why don't you and Nul go find a tree to sit under and share these. I remember when George and I did when we were your age.[223]
Hmph... I don't get what's so special about that giant lambchop.

@, your friend is a riot!$h#$b#They ordered 21 pancakes and ate them like they have a blackhole for a stomach.$h#$b#...#$b#... @, please make sure Nul eats regularly. I love when people enjoy my food, but not the thought of it being their first and last meal for a while.$s
OH MY YOBA!! Nul is literally THE cutest thing! I could just squeeze them to death.$h#$b#... Not... not literally though.$s
Now how would one go about sorting out Nul's medical documents? Do I do it myself or do I refer them to a verterinarian...?$s
Aunt Marnie is kind of scared of Nul but I don't know why. They're really nice.$s#$b#They pretended to be my royal horse and promised to be my fairy godmother the next time we played.$h
My boys really semm to like that friend of yours, @.$h#$b#I wonder if they would join the girls and I at aerobics class.
Does... does your friend always look like that? Hmm... strange.$s#$b#Well, if they're a friend of yours I guess they mean no harm.#$b#Plus, my boys really seem to like them.$h
Did you know that Nul and I are old friends? We go a while back.$h#$b#It's a shame that they disappeared without warning, but it's nice to be able to catch up.

Hold on a sec, @. I'm preparing for a Nul inspired piece.#$b#When are you both available for a modelling session? I could really use the both of you for a reference.$h#$b#I, um... hope you guys don't mind being in your 'natural' state for it.$h
Fluffy person also speaks animal language.$h#$b#They told stories, funny and sad, in sheep language.
I think having the town inclusive for people like Nul is good for community.$h#$b#I'm not sure how well it would work in regards to tourism, though.$s
It's nice to see Nul again.#$b#I remember when they were just a lamb, constantly slipping away from the wizard's lessons just to learn about the land from me.$h
I'll admit, having Nul around Jas made me weary to where I had to watch them closely.$s#$b#Good to know I had nothing to worry about. Who knew Nul was good with kids.$h

Don't get me wrong, @, Nul is nice and all, but they're a bit of an... anomaly.#$b#I-I don't mean it in a bad way! It's just that they seem like a work of fiction. It's interesting$s#$b#Say, how about you bring them over to my place so I can run some examinations. It won't be anything they can't handle.$h

@, when you see Nul again, could you tell them that they're free to join the kids and I on Fridays for assistant teaching.#$b#A-also, could you kindly ask them to wear a bell... they have light footsteps, so it's a surprise when they make their appearance known.$s
Hey farmer. Man you got some weird friends your care, don't ya think?$h#$b#Was kinda suspicious of 'em but my little girl seems to like 'em alot and I love that for her.$b
Hey @, does Nul need a job? I've been seeing them in my store alot and it made me think about getting a mascot.$h#$b#H-hey! Where are you going? It was just a thought.$3
I don't understand how someone so squishy could be hiding that much strength in them.$s#$b#You should share Nul's secret with me, @.$h

Aw man... that was embarassing...$s#$b#Hey, @. Hm? Oh, it's nothing... it's just that I just thought Nul was a girl from behind and tried hitting on them.#$b#It's all good though! We both had a laugh about it! Dude's pretty chill.$h
Hey, um... @? Your friend's name is Nul, right?#$b#They'd make a great addition to a Solarian Chronicles session.$h
Buh, that sheep guy's pretty ominous and freaky looking. They don't say much either.#$b#But... Jas likes them... says they're a pretty princess or whatever.
Aww, my ball got stuck in a tree again.$s#$b#Ah well, I'll just ask Pibling Nul to get it down for me again.
Oh, Nul... my sweet child. I'm so glad you have started to visit me.$h#$b#... Whatever could that look be for, @? A parent can't long for their child?
Aye laddy, yer wool-covered matey be well-dressed for a dance with the sea.$h
@, it ain't a good idea bringin' demons into town, y'know...$a#$b#'Not a demon' you say... Well if they start snatchin' souls you can't say I didn't warn ya.
Apples friend know Fluff Friend?#$b#Fluff Friend now Apples friend too!$h
I've seen a strange face walking through town the other day. I wonder who they are...
Race of sheepfolk, huh? Guess it's time to track down their history and make it available for the library.

Heheh I never knew Magnus had a child so sweet.$h#$b#... though it's a shame they got locked away alongside his ex-wife.#$b#You say they're a good soul? Oh, @, I already knew this. In fact, I feel as if with adequate training they'll be an amazing guild member.$h
Nul's visiting the guild again. That means the Magnus' seal is broken.#$b#Nul grew alot since the last time they visited.$h

UWAH!!... O-oh, it's just you, @.$s#$b#I'm sorry for being jumpy today. I just got spooked a bit by a large person with horns.$s#$b#That's just a friend of yours? Thank Yoba, I thought were gonna hurt us all. No offense, @.$h
Don't tell Proffessor Raz, but Nul has been giving me tips and shortcuts for spellcasting.$h
Well hello there, @! Say, do you think Nul would like to join the Joja family?#$b#I know you're an ex family member of ours but wit- Hey! Why are you walking away!$s

The funniest thing happened last night, dearie.$3#$b#That new friend of yours came into the saloon last night and accidentally ordered the strongest drink they had.$6#$b#If I wasn't weary of them, I honestly would have warned them$s#$b#But I'm glad that I had no need to fear when they started complimenting as many people as possible before Gus made them rest a bit on the side room couch.$h
OH EM SQUEE!! @! Nul's sailor suit is sooo adorable!$h
Hey, you! Have you noticed that Nul almost looks like they belong in the Sailor Mew manga series.$h

@, sweetie. Remember that conversation we had about a cave in the mountain? I'm starting to think that you weren't just tired all along.$s#$b#A sheep... person came from that direction and-... your friend... who lives there? Well, tell that sweetheart thanks again for patching the hole in one of my kegs.$h#$b#I might have been too stunned to thank them properly.$s
Y'know @, I never expected Nul to be so well-read.$h#$b#I... I didn't mean that in a bad way.$s
Adopted a child? That Magnus, always something new about him.$h
I wonder where the new person is from.
That fluffy guy that dropped by the store.... You know them?
I wonder what brought that person to our town. They seem... strange.
It's always nice to have new faces in the neighborhood. I glad your friend is nice to my princess.
Heya, @! Not gonna lie Nul's a pretty cool guy....$h#$b#... or is Nul a girl?$s#$b#Whatever. The point is I really wanna hang out with them more.
Animal hybrid? Hmm...
Dios mios, @. I've never seen someone, like your friend, get so offended over a fish. It's almost humorous!$h
HYA- oop! Sorry, @. Just practicing my swordsmanship for a rematch with Nul.#$b#I still don't understand how they dodged every attack. It's like they were possessed.$s
Ooh cutie~ You and your friend better watch out before I steal you both for myself.$1#$b#Joking! I'm just messing with you... mostly$h
That Nul kid... I doubt they'll ever fit in here.
PAUSE! I've been given inspiration. What happens you combine a sheep and the dark art? Sleepwear of course!$h
I heard the kids love Nul. That'll be good for teaching if they ever feel like volunteering.$h
The new arrival's so lucky to visit in such a beautiful area. The scenery here is amazing.
Nul's pretty strong, @. Maybe Sean and I can borrow them for delivery.$h#$b#... Or tutoring for me?$s#$b#Hm? I didn't say anything.
*sigh* Good thing Nul was able to reach that all-purpose seasoning for me.$h

Heyyy, hot stuff. Hope your not gonna forget me in favor of the fluff-meister.$h#$b#All jokes, of course, buut...#$b#I don't mind sharing with a cutie like them. Heck, I don't think I'll mind playing both your strings right. Only if you're cool with it$7
That wooly friend of yours seems... familiar. Have I met them before?
I guess I'm not the only talented visitor here, hehe.$h#$b#But I really do wonder how they make their spiritual light shows so realistic.
New face, new target. LET'S GOOO!!$h
I saw Nul talking to squirrels near Pierre's shop yesterday. Maybe they're our local animal whisperer.$h
Che meraviglia! I hope Nul finds the community here as warm and friendly as we do.$h
Visiting can be a big change for some. I hope Nul finds what they're looking for here.$h
Shoo! Kiwi friend have fluffy friend with tail and mystery eyes. Where eyes? Why tail?
It's nice to see that our town is still attracting new residents. Especially this time of the year.
It's nice to see some fresh energy around here, regardless of species background.
@ when you see that friend of yours tell them I said 'Benvenuto nella nostra comunit√†'.$h
I hope the new guy is really wealthy, but not more than me!$h
That visitor's absolutely ador-$h#$b#*ahem* I doubt they'll understand our local traditions and customs, so why even bother to visit.$a
I hope that Nul character won't ruin the town with their black magic ideologies.
Let's make sure Nul knows about the best places to eat in town!$h
@, how comes you never told me that Nul spoke a conversational level of my language?$a#$b#You didn't know? Well then it's a surprise for the both of us.$h
I heard Nul's into gardening. Maybe I'll see them helping out the local farmers.
Hm... I wonder if Harvey has veterinary files or... oh, hello @!
Hey @, Nul might need to hear this from a close friend so could tell them to take it easy for a few day? They seemed sluggish and close to passing out.
Anu Oluwa... @, please take this to Nul, they seem exhausted and I'd hate to see anyone in that state. Just this once it's on the house.$a[237]
A new resident means new stories and experiences to share. I hope they drop by to tell a few. Maybe book a room if they want t spend the night.
It's crazy how Nul can pass for a guy and a girl. Pretty cool superpower to come by naturally.$h
People come here from all over. And I guess some come from caves too.$h#$b#I hope they find our town welcoming.
It's nice that your so will to help around. I get a bit walking exercises done and Yuuma doesn't have to worry about me and enjoy being a kid.
May the River Goddess bless Master Nul and all their future endevours.
%Torts is nestling on a piece off black wool... I hope he asked for that.
Heehee! I love it when Nul plays princess with me and Jas.$h#$b#Psst... @, between you and me, they make a prettier princess than my dad. Shh! Don't tell him, I said that!
Aww man... that new guy could see through my master shapeshifting.$s
Oh boy... that Nul really has two left feet.$h#$b#... or hooves... Wait, what DOES Nul have?$s
Nul is nice... they helped me carry some stuff back home.$h
Nul? I haven't had a chance to meet them yet, but I'm looking forward to it.
You don't think Nul is dangerous, right @?$s
Nul want slime friend? Silly make best slime friend!$h
Haha! Hey @, has Nul ever picked you up and spun you around? You should ask them to. It's fun!$h
